org.microbean.helm.maven

Class PackageMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractHelmMojo
        • org.microbean.helm.maven.PackageMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo, Disposable

    @Mojo(name="package")
public class PackageMojo
extends AbstractHelmMojo
implements Disposable
    Packages a Helm chart from its raw materials.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    execute()

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Implements the Disposable interface by closing the AbstractChartLoader returned by the getChartLoader() method and closing the AbstractChartWriter returned by the getChartWriter() method.

        Any IOExceptions encountered are logged.

        Specified by:
        dispose in interface Disposable

      • getSkip

        public boolean getSkip()
        Returns true if this PackageMojo should not execute.
        Returns:
        true if this PackageMojo should not execute; false otherwise
        See Also:
        setSkip(boolean)

      • setSkip

        public void setSkip(boolean skip)
        Controls whether this PackageMojo should execute.
        Parameters:
        skip - if true, this PackageMojo will not execute
        See Also:
        getSkip()
